results.title: DevOps: Automate your infrastructure using Ansible and IaC

visible_instructors.name: TetraNoodle
visible_instructors.job_title: REAL KNOWLEDGE. REAL EXPERIENCE. REAL VALUE.
visible_instructors.title: TetraNoodle Team

results.headline: Use Ansible tasks, modules and playbooks. Deploy, configure and manage your infrastructure w/ Infrastructure as code IaC
objectives_summary: You will get introduced to Infrastructure-As-Code (IaC) and learn what it is all about.
Learn why automating your infrastructure is important (especially in fast paced agile environment)
You will learn how to deploy and configure your infrastructure automatically with Ansible and its various modules

results.title: Ansible Advanced - Hands-On - DevOps
results.headline: Learn and practice advanced topics in Ansible including Roles, Jinja2, Lookups, Filter. Learn to develop custom modules.
objectives_summary: Develop Ansible Playbooks for advanced use cases
Learn about Ansible's execution flow using Strategies
Learn how to handle errors during playbook execution

results.title: Chef Fundamentals: A Recipe for Automating Infrastructure
results.headline: The Chef-Certified beginner’s guide to developing cookbooks locally and distributing changes with a Chef Server
objectives_summary: Describe how Configuration Management with Chef is performed.
Be technically savvy in the process of installing and configuring servers in the cloud or in an on-premise datacenter.
Gain an understanding of Chef's core components, architecture, terminology and have basic fluency with the most commonly used tools.

results.title: Understanding Chef: The Practical Guide
results.headline: Learn step by step process to manage your software infrastructure using Chef
objectives_summary: Learn to setup web infrastructure using Chef
Master core concepts of provisioning and configuration management
Learn practical applications of Chef

results.title: Mastering Chef the Devops Way by School of DevOps®
results.headline: The most comprehensive Chef course. Learn to write Infrastructure as a Code and manage it at scale with Chef
objectives_summary: Infrastructure as a Code and related concepts e.g. idempotence, convergence
Puppet's DSL and best practices to write Manifests, Modules, Node Classification etc.
Create dynamic, data driven modules with Parameters and Templates

results.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate 2018
results.headline: Want to pass the AWS Solutions Architect - Associate Exam? Want to become Amazon Web Services Certified? Do this course!
objectives_summary: Pass the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate Exam
Design Highly Resilient and Scaleable Websites on AWS
Become Intimately Familiar With The AWS Platform

results.title: Learn DevOps: CI/CD with Jenkins using Pipelines and Docker
results.headline: Use Jenkins the DevOps way. Automate your Jenkins jobs by using Jenkins Pipelines, Docker, and the Jenkins Job DSL
objectives_summary: Use Jenkins to perform Continuous Integration within your Software Development Lifecycle
Install Jenkins using docker
Configure Jenkins “The DevOps way”, using Docker, Jobs DSL and Jenkins Pipelines

results.title: Mastering Ansible
results.headline: A complete guide to configuration management and orchestration with Ansible.
objectives_summary: Execute ad-hoc commands against servers using Ansible
Write Ansible configuration playbooks to deploy a 3-tier web application
Configure Ansible roles with tasks, handlers, files, templates, and default variables

results.title: Mastering DevOps
results.headline: Manage your day-to-day IT infrastructure challenges by taking advantage of the DevOps revolution
objectives_summary: Apply systems thinking, deployment strategies, and feedback loops to move fast like Google and Netflix
Maximize the throughput of your organization by applying the CAMS model
Examine which cultural elements create a high-performing IT organization

results.title: Learn DevOps: Infrastructure Automation With Terraform
results.headline: Learn how to automate your infrastructure with terraform. Covers Terraform with AWS, Packer, Docker, ECS, EKS, Jenkins
objectives_summary: Understand, use and apply terraform
Know when to use different features
Use terraform with AWS

results.title: Jenkins Bootcamp: Fully Automate Builds Through Deployment

visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.job_title: Lead Software Engineer, Dev Trainer (17 courses,16k reviews)
visible_instructors.title: Jason Taylor

results.headline: An introduction to the Jenkins build server using continuous integration and deployment techniques -- all step by step.
objectives_summary: Install Jenkins CI server on Windows
Install and configure several tools commonly used with Jenkins
Understand the basics of continuous inspection, continuous integration, and continuous deployment

results.title: Ansible Essentials: Simplicity in Automation
results.headline: Learn the basics of Ansible automation and configuration management, and more
objectives_summary: Understand Ansible and its key components at a high-level and what differentiates it from other tools. Students will also be prepared for more advanced Ansible training courses.
